highlights: Developed Low Latency Application in C++.
Developed GUI with the help of Qt Framwork for Server to control and monitor orders in realtime.
Optimize Application make it send orders with in  <8 microsecond latency.
Cleared Borsa Stock Exchange Certification for Trading Application Approval.
Implemented libcurl  support to company's existing application on Windows.
Added existing application dynamic setting feature which works on XML. XML reflect Settings UI and vice-versa.

Wrote and maintained Qt/C++ based custom translation application which bypasses validator of Qt translation file. With auto-export to RCC resource file support and auto translation from Yendex api support.

projects.description: It is a todo list, task tracking and note making application with auto-saving and multiple tab managing features.
projects.name: qPadNote
CurlUD
projects.description: CurlUD is a C++ based application with Qt library for GUI which helps you to upload and download files to/from server with the help of curl library.

projects.name: GEMP
projects.description: A web server services configuration application developed in python3 with Gtk+. It controls and configure all stack services for you.

projects.name: FlashyPi
projects.description: A tool to flash Raspberry Pi OSs on SD Cards and flashdrives. It can either flash the chosen OS or only format the drive for installing bootloaders like Berryboot, NOOBS, PINNS. and also set the partition size according to your requirement.

projects.name: ngxManager - Multiple host manager
projects.description: It is Python based script to host Nginx Multiple website on a single system.

projects.name: SFML - Distance-between-2-objects
projects.description: Simple program which shows distance between two objects, if they are colliding then object 2 color change randomly. It is written in C++ with SFML Library.
